original_title: The Wild & Wacky Adventures of Chloe
overview: Lost in a self-imposed world of insecurity and failure Joel has given his heart to the one woman he can relate to; Chloe, a comic book sexual-superheroin with the body and exploits to make his every fantasy come true. Caught between his pathetic reality and the erotically charged adventures of his fictional love, Joel starts to spiral into a world of depressed confusion, but before he knows it, here comes Chloe. Faster than a flying cum shot, she comes to his rescue and shows him that love and sex don't have to be a fantasy, all he has to do is open his eyes to the world around him.
tagline: Faster than a Speeding Cum Shot... More Powerful than a Screaming Orgasm!
title: The Wild & Wacky Adventures of Chloe
